#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    long long unsigned int a,b,count,i,j,temp;
    while(1)
    {
    cin>>a;
    cin>>b;
    if(a==0&&b==0)
    break;
    else
    {
    i=1;j=2,count=1;
    while(1)
    {
    if(j>b)
    break;
    if(i>=a)
    count++;
    temp=i;
    i=j;
    j+=temp;
    }
    cout<<count<<endl;
    }
    }
    return 0;
}
